ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Tzeetch - it s the very simple, and very old, Scrap Metal quest located in the bowels of Ak Anon.  Sanfyrd Featherhead (formerly Sanfyrd Montop), will
ygData.messageBody:
At 08:41 AM 7/2/2001 -0700, you wrote:
>Would love to see more details on the quest if you get a chance.


Tzeetch - it's the very simple, and very old, Scrap Metal quest located in
the bowels of Ak'Anon. Sanfyrd Featherhead (formerly Sanfyrd Montop), will
accept scrap metal (in loads of 4 unstacked at a time), which he will give
you coins (a few silver or copper) and a random item recovered from the
scrapyard, which is usually a rusty weapon, small buckler or Gnomish Glow
Rod (light source for off-hand). I believe that either 1) there is an
incredibly small chance for a really nice item, or 2) it was a
fluke. Either way, I just won the lottery as far as I'm concerned...

Talies the Wanderer
